review_data.title: Friends backpacking trip
review_data.content: Most places in Zurich are a bit sterile. Restaurants are a bit empty at most times. But this place was packed and clearly was one of the better places around. In terms of food, it's pretty standard around here and not very good in general.

review_data.title: Love it.
review_data.content: Such a lovely place, especially in Summer. I love the colourful umbrellas and the candles. There is also a gelateria with great icecream. Friendly and quick service. The food is very nice; love the chèvre chaud. A must-go. :)
